metadata.name: Create Skill
metadata.shortDescription: Generate structured skills following established template and principles for OLAF skills architecture
metadata.description: Create new structured skills following OLAF skills architecture with comprehensive validation, error handling, manifest creation, and documentation generation. Handles component discovery (templates, tools, helpers, kb), enforces template separation (external vs embedded), and generates complete BOM with all user-requested dependencies.
objectives: Discover user component requirements and generate structured skills following OLAF architecture
Enforce template separation (external files vs embedded content) and create component files
Apply prompting principles and template structure for clarity and execution
Create complete skill manifest with comprehensive BOM including all components
Generate documentation, ensure file references exist, and validate against OLAF standards
